Posted By: leingodf8 (7/10/2013 1:35:00 AM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
ok, so I officially call B.S. on all P/T conversions that even PRETEND to be halfway based in realism XD  
once upon a time, a 3/3 was an elephant, a 2/2 was a Bear, and I think a 1.5/1.5 was an athletic Human.  
  
Now Whales are 5/5, but if you look at the art.....I think it could probably eat a \*\*\* Mozosaur for breakfast o\_O  
  
IT'S HUGE!!! WAYYY BIGGER THAN any Whale ever has a right to be. This is clearly at least about the size of an [Inkwell Leviathan](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Inkwell Leviathan), with the "Indestructible" being what makes the other creature win in a fight.   
There is no fracking way that [Polar Kraken](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Polar Kraken), for example, is that much bigger than this. I think Colossal Whale could EAT Polar Kraken!  
Or that [B.F.M.](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=B.F.M.) is 20 factors huger. x.x No. that's not true. That's just B.S. XD  
  
Oh and [Primeval Titan](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Primeval Titan) is a 6/6. And this is a 5/5. So that is why Primeval Titan is banned in Commander @\_\_\_@  
  
AND. DO YOU EVEN REALIZE. THE ONLY PART OF THIS CR... [(see all)](javascript:void(0);)
posts.html:
ok, so I officially call B.S. on all P/T conversions that even PRETEND to be halfway based in realism XD
once upon a time, a 3/3 was an elephant, a 2/2 was a Bear, and I think a 1.5/1.5 was an athletic Human.

Now Whales are 5/5, but if you look at the art.....I think it could probably eat a *** Mozosaur for breakfast o_O

IT'S HUGE!!! WAYYY BIGGER THAN any Whale ever has a right to be. This is clearly at least about the size of an Inkwell Leviathan, with the "Indestructible" being what makes the other creature win in a fight.
There is no fracking way that Polar Kraken, for example, is that much bigger than this. I think Colossal Whale could EAT Polar Kraken!
Or that B.F.M. is 20 factors huger. x.x No. that's not true. That's just B.S. XD

Oh and Primeval Titan is a 6/6. And this is a 5/5. So that is why Primeval Titan is banned in Commander @___@

AND. DO YOU EVEN REALIZE. THE ONLY PART OF THIS CR... (see all)

Posted By: Shadowcaster3975 (7/10/2013 3:07:49 AM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
Great art. The abilities are great too. It's just a shame that it has no sort of hexproof or something, like [inkshroud leviathan](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=inkshroud leviathan). Now THAT was an awesome blue fatty. This one is fine too, but far worse than the inkshroud guy.  
I think they could have added some sort of flavorful dive ability. Like   
"![Blue](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=U&type=symbol)![Blue](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=U&type=symbol): colossal whale dives and gains hexproof. While diving, it has -3/-0."  
"![Blue](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=U&type=symbol)![Blue](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=U&type=symbol): colossal whale resurfaces."
posts.html:
Great art. The abilities are great too. It's just a shame that it has no sort of hexproof or something, like inkshroud leviathan. Now THAT was an awesome blue fatty. This one is fine too, but far worse than the inkshroud guy.
I think they could have added some sort of flavorful dive ability. Like
": colossal whale dives and gains hexproof. While diving, it has -3/-0."
": colossal whale resurfaces."
